Masker@ is a service to hide your email address by creating aliases which forward emails to your real email address without exposing it.
This extension helps you create aliases without leaving the website you're on. You can right-click an input, then select "Masker@" â†’ "Create new alias" and a new alias will be automatically filled into that input.
